title: Dazzling Diamond and Pearl Floral Haaram Set with Jhumkas
materials: Base metal plated with 22K Gold. Embellished with high-quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones
a ruby-colored simulated gemstone at the pendant's base
and an emerald-colored simulated gemstone at the center of the floral motif. Features our signature Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced shine and durability.
features: Intricately designed floral motifs crafted in a cascading pattern. Features a statement pendant with a Ruby-like stone at the center, surrounded by CZ diamonds. Delicately suspended imitation pearls add a touch of traditional elegance. Includes matching jhumka earrings, replicating the floral design with an emerald stone on top of the jhumka, and a pearl droplet at the bottom of the jhumka, mirrorring the necklace.
colors: Predominantly gold with dazzling white diamonds (CZ)
and emerald green accents. The pearls offer a creamy white contrast
creating a classic and regal color palette.
occasions: and other festive occasions. Ideal for Muhurtham ceremonies (ముహూర్తం)
or any grand celebration where you want to make a statement.
description: A stunning blend of traditional South Indian design and modern sparkle. The floral motif symbolizes prosperity and beauty, making it a meaningful and cherished piece. Expert craftsmanship ensures lasting quality and brilliance. This set is a true testament to Hyderabadi jewelry artistry, offering exceptional value and timeless appeal.
